description: Adults from higher childhood socioeconomic class report higher agreement with being happier now than in childhood.
estimand: Weighted mean difference between upper vs lower classchild levels
notes: Priority hypothesis for PAP; consider ordinal logit and linear probability specs.

description: Adolescents who received useful parental guidance ages 13-18 report lower current anxiety symptoms.
estimand: Weighted linear regression with anxiety score as outcome
notes: Explore reverse-coding of npvfh98 to align with wellbeing directionality.

description: Childhood verbal/emotional abuse exposure (0-12) predicts higher adult depression frequency.
population_subset: Respondents with non-missing abuse and depression items
estimand: Weighted difference-in-proportions (Likert high vs low) or ordered logit
notes: Need disclosure controls due to sensitive content; flagged for PAP.

description: Respondents with larger sibling groups report lower current net worth brackets.
estimand: Weighted ordered logit on net worth brackets
notes: Check monotonicity and potential nonlinear effects of sibling count.
